name: Mark of Blood
components: V, S, M (a drop of your blood)
text: You place a drop of your blood on a weapon and charge it with magic so that you transfer a small amount of your life essence to the next living creature you strike with the weapon. Thereafter, you can spend a move action to know the direction and general distance of that creature. The target can negate this effect with a successful Will save. You must strike a creature within 1 minute of casting this spell or the magic is wasted, but once the mark of blood takes effect it is permanent until dispelled or removed via an effect like remove curse.
components_zh: 语言，姿势，材料（1滴你的血）
duration_zh: 1分钟 和 永久; 见文本
text_zh: 你用1滴自己的血涂抹在1把武器上，并用魔法将其转化，这样你便可以在下次使用这把武器命中活物时，将少量自身的生命精华（life essence）转移过去。自此以后，你能够以移动动作了解到该生物所在的方向以及大致的距离。目标可以通过1次成功的意志豁免来免受该效果。你必须在施放该法术之后的1分钟内用相应的武器命中生物，否则该法术便被浪费了，但是鲜血之印的效果是永久的（permanent），它会一直持续至移除诅咒（Remove Curse）或者类似的效果将其解除或移除为止。
